channel.title: South Park
channel.description:
Well, it seems South Park has come to it's end. Has anyone watched the latest episode? Kinda sad how they split them all up.
A lot of people say it's starting to suck but i don't see a difference, it's still funny in some way. Even tho they made fun of some stuff that was offensive to me, I'll never forget this show.
EDIT: Ugh, i think it's just rumors, now i see people blabbing bout more seasons, dunno what's going on. For now there is no info about new contracts, so for now end is season 15 and by looking at this episode i doubt there's a way on getting stuff back to normal, or is there... :|

item.title: South Park
item.dc:creator: @patargangstar patargangstar
item.description:
@patargangstar wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:28, topic:398473”][quote author=patargangstar link=topic=495609.msg3624743#msg3624743 date=1307740841]

I think due to the fact that this is a show were Kenny is killed almost every show and magically comes back to life (even though we found out its because his parents joined a cult) we would realize that no matter what happens in the last episode everything goes back to normal next week.

exactly. since when do things ever stay fucked up in south park?
[/quote]
When they kill a character that isn’t Kenny, they die.
Like the old psycho bus lady.[/quote]

yeah but she was… off to say the least >_> good riddance

Read full topic

item.title: South Park
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:21, topic:398473”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=495609.msg3623904#msg3623904 date=1307666407]

Southpark is still signed for 4 more seasons.

How do you know this?

Because two years ago they got signed for 8 seasons. Thats when southpark was sky rocketing. Now its like ehh.
[/quote]
The only stuff they still have to work off of is pop culture. Sometimes it’s a hit, sometimes it’s… depressing…[/quote]
Yeah, I guess shows like that can only last so long. I just prey to god we don’t see any “Star Wars Southpark’s” like Family Guy and Robot Chicken did. I would never watch those .

Read full topic

item.title: South Park
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

South park is the only cartoon I can bare to watch.

Its got a lot of stupid trash humour, but thats combined with some really clever satire in each episode. I love the way each episode has some sort of grand message to it. They always involve some popular culture reference or a real world issue, then blow it out of proportion and exaggerate everything. They do this to illustrate whatever “point” they are trying to make.

Read full topic
